programme.title: Dari Empang Kok Jadi Sayang

programme.title: Love Story The Series S2 - EP 35

programme.title: Mas Paylater Mengalihkan Duniaku

programme.title: ANAK BAND - EP 23
programme.desc: Cahaya, who was trading with his vegetable cart, felt like he got a durian collapse when suddenly Gilang, the vocalist of The Junas, Cahaya's favorite band, ran up to Cahaya asking for help so that Cahaya helped him avoid the pursuit of his fans. Since meeting Dea, Rama's life has started to improve, and he is becoming a disciplined man. Will Rama fall in love with Dea?

programme.title: Conte-Nous ! - EP 15
programme.desc: A long, long time ago, in the heart of the African savannah, animals still had the gift of speech. It was also a time of story-telling, of tales that had so much to teach us, where the main character was a lion, a hyena, a leopard or a frog.

programme.title: Sam & Julia - EP 46
programme.desc: Arriving from a faraway island, Julia the little mouse moves into a new home with her mother. There she meets Sam, another young mouse who's long lived with his parents and a whole gang of brothers and sisters. They quickly become inseparable and enjoy a host of fun adventures together.

programme.title: Idefix Et Les Irreductibles - EP 49
programme.desc: 52 before JC. The city of Lutecia is occupied by the Romans... Completely? No! A gang of invincible animals led by Idefix resist the invader again and again and its plans to romanise the city.

programme.title: Idefix Et Les Irreductibles - EP 50
programme.desc: 52 before JC. The city of Lutecia is occupied by the Romans... Completely? No! A gang of invincible animals led by Idefix resist the invader again and again and its plans to romanise the city.

programme.title: Api ! - EP 2
programme.desc: It's the teacher's birthday! The whole class celebrates with him in a light and joyful atmosphere. But Api is not in the mood for the party: her friends no longer speak to her.

programme.title: Les Croquemoutard - EP 46
programme.desc: The Kiddycrunchers are a family of Trolls who have been forced to leave their home under the bridge and move into the Shoebox Housing Project to Iive amongst human beings! They discover community life and find that it isn't easy to live amongst these scrumptious creatures with their odd ways!

programme.title: Comme Des Tetes Pas De Poule - EP 32
programme.desc: Felix persuades Lounis to start dating. Flavie is invited to her aunt's in San Francisco but Ian isn't sure about letting her go on her own.

programme.title: Koka Kitoumbou - EP 3
programme.desc: Malisha, age 10, accompanied by Rikitou, her little woollen doll, heads off for fabulous adventures in search of the Koka Kitoumbou stone. No ordinary stone, it has magical properties and amazing powers, notably that of turning whatever it touches into sweet treats.

programme.title: OPJ - EP 15
programme.desc: In the early morning, Gaspard Watson suddenly arrives at Clarissa's, completely disoriented and covered in blood that is visibly not his own. His last memory is of having left the police station the day before, and thereafter nothing: a total blackout.

programme.title: OPJ - EP 16
programme.desc: As Jackson manages to piece together Gaspard's actions during the course of the previous evening, he discovers that he'd been in the company of a woman who has since disappeared. Did Gaspard commit a crime, or is someone trying to frame him?

programme.title: Carbone - EP 9
programme.desc: We are all worried about the climate, but we're still not doing enough to solve the problem. Is our psychology acting as a brake on climate action?

programme.title: Destination Francophonie - EP 15
programme.desc: Vietnam has a long history with the French language. When the French withdrew in 1954, the spoken language gradually declined, but today it is seeing a revival throughout the country. Here is the story of Francophonie past and present, from the historic French districts of Hanoi to the Mekong delta.

programme.title: Stoemp, Peket... Et Des Rawettes - EP 6
programme.desc: A veritable celebration of Belgium's regions, along with the locals who live there, their regional languages... and their humour!

programme.title: A Bon Entendeur
programme.desc: ''ABE'' examines a wide range of topics affecting everyday life in everyday homes: it tests products, compares prices, highlights fraudulent practices, raises consumer awareness and questions manufacturers. The programme addresses economic, social, environmental and health issues and talks about leisure activities, technology...

programme.title: Les Belges Du Bout Du Monde - EP 6
programme.desc: Marie-Pierre Lissoir is an ethnomusicologist and researcher at the Traditional Arts and Ethnology Centre. On foot or by tuk-tuk, she shows Adrien her daily life in Luang Prabang, on the banks of the Mekong. From the splendor of Buddhist temples to animist ceremonies, a journey between contemplation and meditation.

programme.title: Le Telejournal De Radio-Canada
programme.desc: The televised news programme from the Radio-Canada team.

programme.title: La Carte Aux Tresors - EP 4
programme.desc: Heading for the Perigord Noir. The game stretches from the Dordogne and Vezere valleys from Lascaux to Biron via Limeuil, Sarlat and La Roque-Gageac. Contestants: Noemie and Antoine.

programme.title: Echappees Belles - EP 26
programme.desc: On top of their oil reserves and destination as a chic destination, the United Arab Emirates are genuinely interesting from a tourism perspective, mainly due to their surprising contrasts: mountains, deserts, beaches, oases, avant-garde buildings, traditional picturesque markets... The 21st century blends with ancient history and sometimes unsettles tourists.

programme.title: Questions Pour Un Champion
programme.desc: A general knowledge quiz.

programme.title: Les Chefs ! - EP 5
programme.desc: The eight cooks compete to produce a winning dish of fried quail with appropriate accompaniments. During the challenge, some of them will also have to present a fried onion starter whilst the others will be preparing apple fritters.

programme.title: TV5 Monde, Le Journal
programme.desc: All the national and international news from the TV5MONDE news staff.

programme.title: Fort Boyard Et Les Cellules Interdites - EP 5
programme.desc: The aim of the Debout en Bouts association is to raise awareness of the inequity of the financial cost of prostheses, to bring about changes in legislation and to enable the funding of such equipment and support for amputees. With Matthieu Lartot, Brahim Asloum, Jerome Fernandez, Vincent Clerc, emilie Andeol, Sarah Ourahmoune, Jean-Baptiste Marteau.

programme.title: Corporate
programme.desc: emilie Tesson-Hansen, a young and brilliant HRD, is recruited to sack the aging managers of a big company. But when one of them commits suicide, the police start investigating and emilie finds herself in the firing line.

programme.title: Nature Morte
programme.desc: Juliette, a policeman, joins her father Rimbaud, a farmer, in a field. One of his cows has been killed and butchered in the night. The young woman will lead the investigation.

programme.title: Pachyderme
programme.desc: This year, as every year, Louise is left with her grandparents for a short holiday in the country. But this year turns out to be very different, it snows and a monster is about to die.

programme.title: Planete Rap
programme.desc: Ably-hosted by Fred Musa on Skyrock, ''Planete Rap'' sets the standard when it comes to rap programmes in France. Thanks to an innovative, fully-optimised system, discover the television adaptation of the radio format that regularly attracts hundreds of thousands of listeners!

programme.title: Fort Boyard 2024, Toujours Plus Fort ! - EP 5
programme.desc: With Matthieu Lartot, Brahim Asloum, Jerome Fernandez, Vincent Clerc, emilie Andeol, Sarah Ourahmoune, Jean-Baptiste Marteau, for the Debout en Bouts association.

programme.title: 64' Le Monde En Francais - 1re Partie
programme.desc: International current affairs as seen by the French-speaking world.

programme.title: 64' Le Monde En Francais - 2e Partie
programme.desc: International current affairs as seen by the French-speaking world.

programme.title: L'invite
programme.desc: Patrick Simonin hosts the stars in the headlines, culture, music, film, books, an unmissable rendezvous with all those who light up our times.

programme.title: 64' L'essentiel
programme.desc: The whole world, in French.

programme.title: Le Conseil Constitutionnel En Temps De Presidentielle
programme.desc: An immersive visit to the very heart of the Palais-Royal, Paris. The Constitutional Council, prestigious French institution, opens its doors to Serge Moati's cameras at a crucial moment in republican life: the presidential election. True stories, little-known anecdotes, archive footage, personal accounts... A look back at the Council's greatest moments.

programme.title: Le Journal De La Rtbf
programme.desc: Complete international news roundup presented by the RTBF news staff.

programme.title: Maurice Chevalier, Un Canotier A Hollywood
programme.desc: A legendary French singer and also an actor, dancer and comic, Maurice Chevalier (1888-1972) became a Hollywood star through films of Ernst Lubitsch, Billy Wilder and Vincente Minnelli, his Menilmontant accent and famous straw hat perfectly capturing the spirit of French irreverence. This is his portrait.

programme.title: Via Idra, Entre Terre Et Ciel - EP 5
programme.desc: After leaving the Cornavòsa mountain hut, the hikers confront the icy knife-edge ridges of the Via Idra, before reaching the Borgna refuge. It's then time to confront their final peak and take a moment to look back on the most unforgettable moments of their breathtaking trek.

programme.title: Le Journal De La Rts
programme.desc: All the news from RTS.

programme.title: Le Journal De France 2
programme.desc: The television news programme of the France 2 editorial board (8 p.m. edition, Paris time).

programme.title: 64' Le Monde En Francais - 1re Partie
programme.desc: International current affairs as seen by the French-speaking world.

programme.title: 64' Le Monde En Francais - 2e Partie
programme.desc: International current affairs as seen by the French-speaking world.

programme.title: L'invite
programme.desc: Patrick Simonin hosts the stars in the headlines, culture, music, film, books, an unmissable rendezvous with all those who light up our times.

programme.title: 64' L'essentiel
programme.desc: The whole world, in French.

programme.title: Hj Lim, Le Son Du Silence
programme.desc: A virtuoso pianist, Lim Hyun Jung revisits some of the places from her life: the family home in Anyang, Korea, Paris's prestigious Conservatoire National Superieur de Musique et de Danse, the church in Compiegne and the Baeknyeong Buddhist temple, discussing her loves, her sorrows, her doubts and her successes...

programme.title: Ma Petite Escapade - EP 4
programme.desc: Sea-lover, Philippe is also president of the association Le Clown en Choeur whose members perform in hospitals. During his trip to Granville, Clemence Castel offers him an opportunity to allow his emotions to get the upper hand.

programme.title: Serieux ? - EP 6
programme.desc: Marie-eve meets the hunter Fabien Cloutier in Longueuil and Pascal the butcher advises Mathieu on how to eat less but better when it comes to meat. Plus, all about mealworms: food for the future, eating better without destroying the planet!

programme.title: Cosy, Le Mag Deco - EP 9
programme.desc: Not far from Strasbourg, Fred has converted an old barn into a comfortable home.

programme.title: Nus & Culottes - EP 2
programme.desc: Still without any clothes and penniless, Nans and Mouts set off from Saint-Raphael on the Cote d'Azur with a dream: organising a piano concert at the foot of a glacier. On top of their ambitious mission, the two friends have to find food, accommodation and a pianist.

programme.title: 6h Info
programme.desc: The 6am news bulletin (Paris time) by the France Televisions editorial team.

programme.title: Telematin
programme.desc: The latest news and laughter, 7 days a week With Flavie Flament and Julien Arnaud on weekdays, Maya Lauque and Damien Thevenot at weekends.

programme.title: Telematin
programme.desc: The latest news and laughter, 7 days a week With Flavie Flament and Julien Arnaud on weekdays, Maya Lauque and Damien Thevenot at weekends.

programme.title: Chef Pays - EP 26
programme.desc: Chef Sanjee makes rose, pistachio and honey rice pudding.

programme.title: Slam
programme.desc: Three contestants compete in a game of arrow crosswords, trying to complete the grids by finding the answers to the definitions provided. But to have access to those definitions, they first need to answer questions that all share one common characteristic: the response is always a letter.

programme.title: Le Telejournal De Radio-Canada
programme.desc: The televised news programme from the Radio-Canada team.

programme.title: Cosy, Le Mag Deco - EP 9
programme.desc: Not far from Strasbourg, Fred has converted an old barn into a comfortable home.

programme.title: Ma Petite Escapade - EP 4
programme.desc: Sea-lover, Philippe is also president of the association Le Clown en Choeur whose members perform in hospitals. During his trip to Granville, Clemence Castel offers him an opportunity to allow his emotions to get the upper hand.

programme.title: Rocky & Lily : C'est Dans La Boite ! - EP 120
programme.desc: Each day, Rocky and Lily receive a new box in the studio. But what's inside? One thing is certain, it's bound to contain a surprise that will lead them to discover a host of very different subjects: from guitars to trolls and even how to sort your waste for recycling!

programme.title: Kididoc - EP 30
programme.desc: Kidi, a kind-hearted artificial intelligence, guides Pomme and Fix on their journey through Kidi-World. From dinosaurs to the Chateau de Versailles, the human body to the history of aviation: Kidi-World is not only an adventure-filled wonderland but also, and above all, a means of finding the answer to every question.

programme.title: Ta Vie Sans Ca - EP 58
programme.desc: What would life be like without our most everyday objects? Each episode puts a different one in the spotlight. Whether a tap, an umbrella or a toothbrush, they all have a story to tell about their invention and subsequent evolution.

programme.title: Les Super-Pouvoirs Du Vivant - EP 5
programme.desc: The animal kingdom is brimming with creatures that have extraordinary powers. To reveal the incredible inventiveness of nature and the importance of protecting it, each episode takes us on a fascinating journey rich in poetry and humour.

programme.title: Les Super-Pouvoirs Du Vivant - EP 6
programme.desc: The animal kingdom is brimming with creatures that have extraordinary powers. To reveal the incredible inventiveness of nature and the importance of protecting it, each episode takes us on a fascinating journey rich in poetry and humour.

programme.title: Le Pacte - EP 6
programme.desc: Arnaud's return raises more questions than it answers. Everyone's watching a revenge video posted on social media.

programme.title: Chef Pays - EP 26
programme.desc: Chef Sanjee makes rose, pistachio and honey rice pudding.

programme.title: Questions Pour Un Champion
programme.desc: A general knowledge quiz.

programme.title: Silence, Ca Pousse ! - EP 9
programme.desc: On the programme: Fany Perret's screen prints; cordials; Bagatelle roses; ''Pas de panique'' in the garden of Laurence and Camille.

programme.title: TV5 Monde, Le Journal
programme.desc: All the national and international news from the TV5MONDE news staff.

programme.title: La Vie Acrobate
programme.desc: Paraplegic following a trapeze fall, Silke Pan has become a high-level athlete in paracycling. Coline Confort follows her as she prepares for the Tokyo 2020 Paralympic Games.

programme.title: Tendance XXI - EP 6
programme.desc: Exploring the exhibition ''Psychanalyse d'un Meuble a Quatre Pattes'' at the Monnaie de Paris. All about ballet flats. Julia Terranova, designer for the jewellery brand YAY. Staple of the military wardrobe, cargo trousers are back. The Comite Colbert organises a fair dedicated to expertise and know-how in the luxury industry.

programme.title: La Peinture Francaise Autour Du Monde - EP 7
programme.desc: A fine arts museum located in Pasadena, to the north-east of Los Angeles, the Norton Simon Museum displays a superb collection of European paintings, from Renaissance to Modern art. Classical French art is represented by Lorrain, Poussin, Fragonard, Robert, Boucher, Vernet, Vigee Le Brun...

programme.title: Pauline Grandeur Nature
programme.desc: Pauline, separated, tries to balance motherhood and work as a landscape designer. Her life becomes even more complicated when her mother announces she's moving abroad and won't be able to help any more. So when she's finally given a major project to manage, a total burnout is on the horizon...

programme.title: Hologic WTA Tour 2025
programme.desc: The Canadian Open is a prestigious professional tennis tournament held annually in Montreal and Toronto. The tournament alternates between Montreal and Toronto each year. Toronto’s Sobeys Stadium holds 12,500 tennis fans, while Montreal’s IGA Stadium holds 11,500.It is the second-oldest active tennis tournament in the world.

programme.title: ASO Marathon Programming 2025
programme.desc: The Barcelona Marathon is an annual marathon held in March in Barcelona, Catalonia, Spain, and first held in 1978 in Palafrugell, Catalonia. programme.title: PL BEST OF... THE PREMIER LEAGUE HALL OF FAME
programme.desc: An action-packed hour featuring legendary Hall of Fame icons, including Ashley Cole, Andy Cole, Tony Adams, Peter Schmeichel, Paul Scholes, Thierry Henry, Alan Shearer, and Frank Lampard

programme.title: PL STORIES - EP 52
programme.desc: We dive into the fiercest rivalry in English football-Manchester United and Liverpool. As Liverpool draw level with United's record haul of top-flight titles, this is a story of history, pride, and the relentless pursuit of greatness. With insight from icons on both sides-Ian Rush, Lou Macari, Brian Kidd, Michael Owen, Phil Thompson, and new Liverpool boss Arne Slot, we unpack the moments that have defined generations, split families, and lit up the Premier League.

programme.title: PL STORIES - EP 47
programme.desc: We look back on the extraordinary career of Mohamed Salah, tracing his rise from a small village in Egypt to global football stardom. We speak to those closest to him to highlight his early years, struggles, and determination, shedding light on the pivotal moments that shaped his journey to becoming a Premier League legend with Liverpool.

programme.title: GOALS OF THE SEASON - 2024/2025 (GB: SALAH)
programme.desc: From free-kicks to solo runs, scissor kicks to 30-yard screamers, Goals of the Season revisits some of the most memorable strikes from the 24/25 campaign, whilst paying homage to the Golden Boot winner.

programme.title: PL STORIES - EP 7
programme.desc: We sit down with Bruno Guimarães to trace his remarkable journey from the streets of Brazil to Premier League stardom with Newcastle United. Travelling back to South America, we meet the family, friends, and coaches who shaped his early years and believed in his dream. Bruno opens up about the sacrifices, setbacks, and defining moments that fuelled his rise, offering a heartfelt look at the person behind the player.

programme.title: PL STORIES - EP 9
programme.desc: Newcastle United are a team on the rise under Eddie Howe; a manager quietly rewriting the modern history of the club. With exclusive access and interviews from inside St. James' Park, we uncover the transformation Howe has led, from stabilising the team to delivering silverware and reigniting belief on Tyneside. As the Magpies set their sights on even greater heights, we ask just how far he can take this ambitious, resurgent club.

programme.title: WELCOME TO THE WEEKEND: Best Of Welcome To The Weekend #3
programme.desc: The very best from the 2024/25 season as Hollywood superstar Michael B Jordan tries to guess what happens next when he watches some infamous PL moments. Emi Martinez ranks his best saves while Liverpool legend John Barnes answers some burning questions.

programme.title: PL RAW: STORY OF THE SEASON 24/25
programme.desc: Look back on another incredible Premier League season through the lens of PL RAW, featuring all the biggest and best moments from the 24/25 campaign.

programme.title: PL BEST OF... THE PREMIER LEAGUE HALL OF FAME
programme.desc: An action-packed hour featuring legendary Hall of Fame icons, including Ashley Cole, Andy Cole, Tony Adams, Peter Schmeichel, Paul Scholes, Thierry Henry, Alan Shearer, and Frank Lampard

programme.title: PL STORIES - EP 3
programme.desc: He was recently inducted into the exclusive Premier League Hall of fame, but what made Andrew Cole so special? We sit down with the ex-Manchester striker to discuss his stand-out moments in the English top flight and chat to his teammates that knew him, to find out what really made him tick.

programme.title: PL STORIES - EP 3
programme.desc: With 208 goals in 491 top flight appearances, Wayne Rooney is widely regarded as one of the best strikers to have played in the League. We sit down with the Englishman to discuss the moments that made him a legend and helped him rightly earn his place in the Premier League Hall of Fame.

programme.title: PL REWIND - EP 14
programme.desc: A West Ham cult hero, Slaven Bilic first represented the Irons as a player in the 1990s. He returned to the club as manager in 2015, ahead of the Hammers' final season at Upton Park. The Croatian looks back on what proved to be a remarkable campaign in East London.

programme.title: PL REWIND - EP 17
programme.desc: Mario Melchiot recalls his Premier League journey, which began as part of an ambitious Chelsea team. The Dutch defender played in the Blues' high-stakes final day clash in 2003 with Liverpool, before moving to Birmingham City and then captaining Wigan Athletic.

programme.title: PL STORIES - EP 3
programme.desc: We celebrate the greatest goalscorers in Premier League history; the icons whose instinct, power, and flair have lit up stadiums and etched their names into footballing folklore. From Alan Shearer's relentless consistency to Thierry Henry's elegance, Sergio Aguero's killer instinct to Harry Kane's rise, we relive the moments that defined an era.

programme.title: PL STORIES - EP 51
programme.desc: As the curtain comes down on Everton's time at Goodison Park, PL Stories takes a poignant look back at one of English football's most iconic grounds. For over 130 years, Goodison has been more than just a stadium; it's been a home, a fortress, and the stage for countless moments of triumph, heartbreak, and unforgettable drama.

programme.title: PL STORIES - EP 52
programme.desc: We dive into the fiercest rivalry in English football-Manchester United and Liverpool. As Liverpool draw level with United's record haul of top-flight titles, this is a story of history, pride, and the relentless pursuit of greatness. With insight from icons on both sides-Ian Rush, Lou Macari, Brian Kidd, Michael Owen, Phil Thompson, and new Liverpool boss Arne Slot, we unpack the moments that have defined generations, split families, and lit up the Premier League.

programme.title: PL STORIES - EP 9
programme.desc: Newcastle United are a team on the rise under Eddie Howe; a manager quietly rewriting the modern history of the club. With exclusive access and interviews from inside St. James' Park, we uncover the transformation Howe has led, from stabilising the team to delivering silverware and reigniting belief on Tyneside. As the Magpies set their sights on even greater heights, we ask just how far he can take this ambitious, resurgent club.

programme.title: PL STORIES - EP 7
programme.desc: We sit down with Bruno Guimarães to trace his remarkable journey from the streets of Brazil to Premier League stardom with Newcastle United. Travelling back to South America, we meet the family, friends, and coaches who shaped his early years and believed in his dream. Bruno opens up about the sacrifices, setbacks, and defining moments that fuelled his rise, offering a heartfelt look at the person behind the player.

programme.title: PL STORIES - EP 49
programme.desc: Upon creating an American Ice Hockey team, owner Bill Foley outlandlishly claimed his team would lift the Stanley Cup in six years. His dream came true. Now, owner of AFC Bournemouth and flying in the Premier League, he's already making bold claims for the Cherries' future.

programme.desc: One of the most elegant players ever to grace the beautiful game, Dimitar Berbatov reached his peak in the red of Manchester United. The Bulgarian recalls his journey, from humble beginnings to becoming a Premier League champion and Golden Boot winner.

programme.title: PL REWIND - EP 12
programme.desc: Jermain Defoe scored 162 Premier League goals, and it was at Tottenham where he was at his prolific best. The striker recalls his two spells with the North London club, including the memorable occasion where he hit 5 in one match.

programme.title: PL STORIES - EP 3
programme.desc: He was recently inducted into the exclusive Premier League Hall of fame, but what made Tony Adams so special? We sit down with 'Mr Arsenal' to discuss his stand out moments in the English top flight and chat to his teammates that knew him to find out what really made him tick.

programme.title: REVIEW OF THE SEASON - 2024/2025 (LIV)
programme.desc: Relive another extraordinary Premier League campaign as Liverpool soared to an historic 20th league title, Nottingham Forest defied expectations and the promoted sides were strenuously challenged. There were also tactical transformations, shifts in narrative trends, and a more open field than ever before. Review of the Season documents all of the thrilling stories to emerge across the 380 matches.

programme.title: PL STORIES - EP 1
programme.desc: We catch up with Juan Mata in Australia, where the former Premier League star is now playing with Western Sydney Wanderers. The Spaniard reflects on his memorable years in England with Chelsea and Manchester United, sharing insights into his greatest moments, personal growth, and connection with fans. As he begins a new chapter down under, he also opens up about life after the Premier League and what lies ahead both on and off the pitch.

programme.desc: The very best from the 2024/25 season as Hollywood superstar Michael B Jordan tries to guess what happens next when he watches some infamous PL moments. Emi Martinez ranks his best saves while Liverpool legend John Barnes answers some burning questions.

programme.title: WELCOME TO THE WEEKEND: Best Of Welcome To The Weekend #2
programme.desc: Welcome to the Weekend head to the Midlands in this episode of the best from the 2024/25 season as JJ, Olivia and Andrew are pitchside at the King Power Stadium. Ayo gets unrivalled access at Anfield while Afrobeats star Joeboy joins the team on the sofa.

programme.title: PL STORIES - EP 49
programme.desc: Upon creating an American Ice Hockey team, owner Bill Foley outlandlishly claimed his team would lift the Stanley Cup in six years. His dream came true. Now, owner of AFC Bournemouth and flying in the Premier League, he's already making bold claims for the Cherries' future.

programme.title: Wolverhampton Wanderers vs Nottingham Forest (MW20) - EP 200
programme.desc: Wolves have lost just one of their last 12 league games against Nottingham Forest (W5 D6) and are unbeaten in all five against them in the Premier League (W1 D4).

programme.title: Newcastle United vs AFC Bournemouth (MW22) - EP 211
programme.desc: Newcastle United have won their last nine matches in all competitions and the Magpies are looking to win 10 in a row for the first time in their entire history.

programme.title: Nottingham Forest vs Brighton and Hove Albion (MW24) - EP 231
programme.desc: Brighton won this exact fixture 3-2 last season - they’ve never before won consecutive away league games against Nottingham Forest.

programme.title: Ipswich Town vs Manchester City (MW22) - EP 219
programme.desc: Manchester City have conceded 29 goals in 21 Premier League games this season, with their average of 1.4 goals conceded per game their highest in a single campaign since 2007-08 (also 1.4).

programme.title: Liverpool vs Manchester United (MW20) - EP 199
programme.desc: Liverpool have lost just one of their last 13 Premier League games against Manchester United (W7 D5), going down 2-1 at Old Trafford in August 2022.

programme.title: Manchester City vs Chelsea (MW23) - EP 226
programme.desc: Manchester City are unbeaten in their last seven Premier League games against Chelsea (W5 D2), since a 2-1 home loss in May 2021.

programme.title: Newcastle United vs Nottingham Forest (MW26) - EP 259
programme.desc: Newcastle have lost just one of their 13 Premier League meetings with Nottingham Forest (W9 D3), though that defeat did come in this exact fixture last season (1-3).

programme.title: Brighton and Hove Albion vs Chelsea (MW25) - EP 241
programme.desc: After a five-game unbeaten run against Chelsea in the Premier League (W2 D3), Brighton have now lost each of their last three against them.

programme.title: AFC Bournemouth vs Nottingham Forest (MW23) - EP 221
programme.desc: Bournemouth are unbeaten in their last 10 Premier League games (W6 D4), with only the current top two sides Liverpool (17) and Arsenal (12) enjoying a longer ongoing run at present.

programme.title: Everton vs Liverpool (MW15) - EP 141
programme.desc: Liverpool’s 2-0 loss in this exact fixture last season ended a 12-game unbeaten away run in the Premier League against Everton (W3 D9). They’ve not lost consecutive visits to Goodison Park since a run of three between 1992 and 1994.

programme.title: Arsenal vs Manchester City (MW24) - EP 239
programme.desc: Having won 12 consecutive league games against Arsenal between 2017 and 2023, Manchester City are now winless in their last three against the Gunners (D2 L1).

programme.title: Manchester City vs Liverpool (MW26) - EP 260
programme.desc: Manchester City have lost just one of their last 15 Premier League home games against Liverpool (W8 D6), going down 4-1 in November 2015 under Manuel Pellegrini.

programme.title: TF2 - The Fighter
programme.desc: In this episode, the TF2 semi-finals take place in dramatic fashion with two fights on one night. The finalists are revealed and face off for the first time before their live finale fight on 29 June at Carnival City.

programme.title: WCCB Dina Thorslund vs. Mary Romero
programme.desc: WBC & WBO Women's Bantamweight World Champion Dina Thorslund puts her titles and undefeated record on the line in front of her hometown fans at the Royal Arena in Copenhagen, Denmark, taking on top contender Mary Romero of Spain. Thorslund has held World Championship gold for over five years, including seven defenses of the WBO World Title before adding the WBC Championship in September. She now steps into the ring against the former European Super Bantamweight Champion, Mary Romero.

programme.title: Wide World of Fights Shane Mosley vs. Ricardo Mayorga
programme.desc: This episode features Shane Mosley looking for a win against Ricardo Mayorga, as well as kickboxing, sumo and more!

programme.title: Judo for the World
programme.desc: Judo for the World features the best competitors in the sport as they compete in a global tour for an opportunity to vie for the gold in the World Judo Championship. In this special one hour episode, we see the best of the World Judo Championships from Budapest where everyone in the world swarms to witness the crowning of 14 world champions. Also, world renowned fighter Teddy Riner experiences his hardest title defense in his career.

programme.title: KNOCKOUTS! Saul (Canelo) Alvarez vs. Ryan Rhodes
programme.desc: The main event in this episode sees Saul (Canelo) Alvarez making his first defense of the WBC light middleweight title, taking on challenger Ryan Rhodes. The bout ends in the final round after a series of unanswered blows. Also on the card, action from former light heavyweight champ Adonis Stevenson.

programme.title: FS Grand Sumo
programme.desc: For the first time the top ranked sumo competitors in the world are featured in an action packed series, FIGHT SPORTS GRAND SUMO. This new format presents Sumo in an authentic, in-depth and entertaining way covering the rules, ranks, match-ups, and more. Episode 2 from Dolphins Areana in Nagoya, Japan features Hakuho, Meisei, Shodai and Takayasu.

programme.title: World Karate Federation
programme.desc: The highest level of competition in the sport of karate anywhere in the world will take place from Budapest, Hungary, as the WKF SENIOR WORLD CHAMPIONSHIPS take place. The top competitors from across the globe, from six different continents, will all converge on Budapest to stake their claim as the best in the world. Don't miss the WKF SENIOR WORLD CHAMPIONSHIPS, only on FIGHT SPORTS.

programme.title: MMA:30
programme.desc: This episode features an interview with former UFC light heavyweight champion and true MMA legend, "The Phenom" Vitor Belfort. Cage fighting veteran Frank Mir shows off his classic car and high tech hot rod collection and MMA legend Chuck Liddell unveils his life size wax statue.

programme.title: WCCB Marco Huck vs. Ola Afolabi III
programme.desc: World Class Championship Boxing brings us back to the third fight of Marco Huck and Ola Afolabi's thrilling rivalry, again with the WBO Cruiserweight World Championship at stake. Huck and Afolabi both came into the fight ranked within the top 3 in the world in the cruiserweight division, and looked to build on their memorable slugfest from a year prior. Both enter the ring with something to prove, and wanting to leave as WBO Cruiserweight World Champion. It's Marco Huck vs.

programme.title: Greatest Classics Hector Camacho vs. Tony Menefee
programme.desc: Hector "Macho" Camacho, always entertaining and flamboyant, stepping into the ring with 62-4 Tony Menefee in Lincoln, Nebraska. Camacho was on the comeback trail, following an up and down year that saw him defeat the legendary Sugar Ray Leonard by TKO before dropping a unanimous decision to Oscar De La Hoya for the WBC Welterweight Title. With his eyes on another title shot he faces Menefee, in the midst of a 14-fight win streak.

programme.title: KNOCKOUTS! Bernard Hopkins vs. Chad Dawson
programme.desc: The main event in this episode is Bernard Hopkins facing off with Chad Dawson in a light heavyweight championship rematch from their controversial October 2011 bout. Also on the card, action from former welterweight champ James Kirkland.

programme.title: FS Grand Sumo
programme.desc: For the first time the top ranked sumo competitors in the world are featured in an action packed series, FIGHT SPORTS GRAND SUMO. programme.title: Greatest Classics Hector Camacho vs. Tony Menefee
programme.desc: Hector "Macho" Camacho, always entertaining and flamboyant, stepping into the ring with 62-4 Tony Menefee in Lincoln, Nebraska. Camacho was on the comeback trail, following an up and down year that saw him defeat the legendary Sugar Ray Leonard by TKO before dropping a unanimous decision to Oscar De La Hoya for the WBC Welterweight Title. With his eyes on another title shot he faces Menefee, in the midst of a 14-fight win streak.

programme.title: Bluey (S3) - EP 1
programme.desc: Chilli and Bandit transform the old nursery into a new bedroom for Bluey. In the process, Bluey and Bingo amicably divide their belongings, but get absorbed by trading items and swapping notes at bedtime. Ultimately, when Bluey misses her sister, she asks to return to her old room.

programme.title: Hey Duggee's Squirrel Club (S1) - EP 1
programme.desc: At Squirrel Club, Detective Puppy solves the mystery of a missing biscuit, the Rabbits tell us what's cool, and the Squirrels help Delivery Chipmunk with a huge parcel.

programme.desc: The Go Jetters snap into action as Glitch seeks some festive cheer on Christmas Island.

programme.desc: When Bingo stops playing Bluey's spy game, their grown-up controlling device stops working properly! Bluey now sees how important Bingo is and needs to win her back!

programme.desc: When it's Bingo's turn to bring her Kindy's Bob Bilby puppet home and record their weekend in the scrapbook, the family resolve to show him a good time.

programme.title: Dog Squad (S2) - EP 1
programme.desc: It's puppy cadet training day, when pups all over Woofton see if they've got what it takes to become an assistance dog.

programme.title: Aneeshwar and Lizzie Go Wild (S2) - EP 1
programme.desc: Aneeshwar and Lizzie head out to meet lions. From their safari truck, they get right in amongst the pride and see big maned males as well as a large group of females. Their next animal is Rico, a two-toed sloth.

programme.desc: Sarah & Duck try to work out exactly what it is that Scarf Lady has been busily knitting in her sleep.

programme.title: Late Night With Seth Meyers 2025
programme.desc: "Late Night with Seth Meyers" is home to A-list celebrity guests, memorable comedy and topical monologue jokes. programme.title: Africa Live
programme.desc: Africa Live is a news program that focuses on African issues and issues related to this diverse continent. CGTN’s Nairobi-based broadcast center produces Africa Live. Local correspondents and local production teams provide authoritative and in-depth stories from across the region. Africa Live is an objective and comprehensive look at every facet of African life.

programme.title: Zoom In
programme.desc: A TV news magazine show packed with top stories from around the world. programme.title: China 24

programme.title: The Agenda
programme.desc: A weekly talk-show looking beyond the headlines and "accepted wisdom" to find the real story. programme.title: Big Story

Big Story aims to present the contemporary world and China’s global perspectives on the contemporary world to an international audience.

programme.title: KBS WORLD News Today
programme.desc: Bringing you KBS World daily English news, anchored by Choi Kyu-yeon.

programme.title: My Neighbor, Charles - EP 492
programme.desc: Foreigners, leaving their homelands behind, have come all the way to a new country, South Korea, for reasons such as work, study or even marriage. The real stories of foreigners who challenge themselves to survive in Korean society are unfolded!

programme.title: Music Bank - EP 1259
programme.desc: The best tunes in Korea, on the most sensational TV music show that satisfies all your senses! Follow the latest trend in the Korean music scene through the K-chart, a summary of the week's hottest songs.

programme.title: Healer - EP 3
programme.desc: A mysterious messenger named Seo Jung-hu operates under the codename "Healer". He takes on secretive missions, aided by a hacker known as Ahjumma. Adventure and romance ensue when he meets tabloid reporter Chae Young-shin and star journalist Kim Moon-ho.

programme.title: Good Luck! - EP 73
programme.desc: This drama revolves around three friends - one who is rich, one who is poor, and one who wishes to be rich - along with their families.

programme.title: Queen's House - EP 66
programme.desc: This revenge story is about a woman in the top one per cent who starts over from the ground up to reclaim her stolen life and find her true 'home'. A passionate drama about people striving to regain the true meaning of life.

programme.title: The First Night With the Duke - EP 7
programme.desc: A seemingly ordinary college girl finds herself reincarnated as a background extra in a romance novel, only to spend a night with the story's most dangerously obsessive male lead. A romantic fantasy with no brakes begins!

programme.title: Stars' Top Recipe at Fun-Staurant - EP 280
programme.desc: Gourmet celebrities team up to explore the world of convenience stores and share their secret recipes!

programme.title: Jeon Woochi - EP 13
programme.desc: Jeon Woochi is a mischievous wizard who gains his powers by swallowing a gumiho bead. After a betrayal costs him his mentor and the love of his life, Woochi travels to Joseon to seek revenge.

programme.desc: The story follows Li Su Su (Bai Lu) as she assumes the identity of mortal Ye Xi Wu and travels 500 years ago to stop the demon lord's resurrection. As she journeys, her fate tangles with Tantai Jin (Leo Luo), the lord's captive prince.

programme.title: The Prisoner of Beauty - EP 11
programme.desc: [With English and Chinese subtitles] Xiao Qiao (Song Zuer) and Wei Shao (Liu Yuning) enter into a political marriage and gradually develop feelings for each other. Together, they unite their efforts to protect their country while building a harmonious family.

programme.title: The Prisoner of Beauty - EP 12
programme.desc: [With English and Chinese subtitles] Xiao Qiao (Song Zuer) and Wei Shao (Liu Yuning) enter into a political marriage and gradually develop feelings for each other. Together, they unite their efforts to protect their country while building a harmonious family.

programme.desc: [With English and Chinese subtitles] Xiao Qiao (Song Zuer) and Wei Shao (Liu Yuning) enter into a political marriage and gradually develop feelings for each other. Together, they unite their efforts to protect their country while building a harmonious family.

programme.title: Mental Coach Jegal - EP 3
programme.desc: A former Taekwondo athlete, who is permanently banned from the national team, becomes a mental coach to help players in slump, heal retired athletes and engage a real match against the absurd world of winner-take-all.

programme.title: Evilive - EP 1
programme.desc: The series tells the story of a struggling lawyer Han Dong Soo (Shin Ha Kyun) who gets cases by recklessly visiting prisoners. He meets an absolute villain and transforms into an elite villain himself.

programme.title: Breaking the Shadows - EP 11
programme.desc: Summer 2017, a rain-soaked southern town is rocked by the discovery of dismembered remains. Officer Han Qing (Sun Li) investigates while searching for her missing partner, Zhong Wei (Luo Jin). As the case unfolds, a major drug trafficking operation unveils.

programme.title: Breaking the Shadows - EP 12
programme.desc: Summer 2017, a rain-soaked southern town is rocked by the discovery of dismembered remains. Officer Han Qing (Sun Li) investigates while searching for her missing partner, Zhong Wei (Luo Jin). As the case unfolds, a major drug trafficking operation unveils.

programme.title: The Tale of Lady Ok - EP 4
programme.desc: The story follows legal expert Ok Tae Young (Im Ji Yeon) during the Joseon period whose name, identity, and husband are all fabricated. Entangled in a fierce survival scheme, entertainer Cheon Seung Hwi (Choo Young Woo) is willing to risk his life for her.

programme.desc: The series tells the story of a struggling lawyer Han Dong Soo (Shin Ha Kyun) who gets cases by recklessly visiting prisoners. He meets an absolute villain and transforms into an elite villain himself.

programme.title: The Long River - EP 9
programme.desc: After a huge flood during the 15th year of his reign, the young Emperor Kang Xi conducts civil service examinations to recruit talented individuals to solve the problems plaguing the Yellow River, allowing the 24-year-old Chen Huang an opportunity to come to the fore.

programme.title: Breaking the Shadows - EP 13
programme.desc: Summer 2017, a rain-soaked southern town is rocked by the discovery of dismembered remains. Officer Han Qing (Sun Li) investigates while searching for her missing partner, Zhong Wei (Luo Jin). As the case unfolds, a major drug trafficking operation unveils.

programme.title: Evilive - EP 2
programme.desc: The series tells the story of a struggling lawyer Han Dong Soo (Shin Ha Kyun) who gets cases by recklessly visiting prisoners. He meets an absolute villain and transforms into an elite villain himself.

programme.title: Young Lady and Gentleman - EP 31
programme.desc: A spirited young woman with a big heart becomes the new live-in tutor for a wealthy household grieving a recent loss, a romance blooms between the two of them.

programme.title: Everlasting Longing - EP 22
programme.desc: [With English and Chinese subtitles] The story follows Jun Qiluo (Angelababy), the eldest daughter of the ruling Jun family, who unexpectedly meets Xuan Lie (Song Weilong), the leader of the Xuan tribe, and go through hardships and life-and-death experiences.

programme.title: Lo And Behold - EP 2007
programme.desc: This story revolves around the Hung family, their working lives and friends, as well as the ghost that the family befriends!

programme.title: Golden City - EP 679
programme.desc: Set in the 60s in Jioufen, the story tells how three sworn brothers conquer the world with their bare hands. While connecting romance from the previous generation to the shared emotions with the present, the drama explores differences in generational values.

programme.title: Anonymous Signal - EP 4
programme.desc: Three police rookies and a senior develop a tight relationship until they parted ways due to an operation. Mysterious text messages that can't be scientifically explained are being sent to them following a dismemberment murder of a young girl. Who sent them?

programme.title: The Prisoner of Beauty - EP 15
programme.desc: [With English and Chinese subtitles] Xiao Qiao (Song Zuer) and Wei Shao (Liu Yuning) enter into a political marriage and gradually develop feelings for each other. Together, they unite their efforts to protect their country while building a harmonious family.

programme.title: Lo And Behold - EP 2007
programme.desc: This story revolves around the Hung family, their working lives and friends, as well as the ghost that the family befriends!

programme.title: The Unexpected Marriage - EP 17
programme.desc: Princess Liu Chang Sheng of the Fu Yu Kingdom, faces obstacles in finding a spouse. The Emperor sends her to marry the ruthless Prince Li Jing of the Da Tang Kingdom. They embark on a comical journey to ultimately discover the true meaning of love.

programme.title: The Unexpected Marriage - EP 18
programme.desc: Princess Liu Chang Sheng of the Fu Yu Kingdom, faces obstacles in finding a spouse. The Emperor sends her to marry the ruthless Prince Li Jing of the Da Tang Kingdom. They embark on a comical journey to ultimately discover the true meaning of love.

programme.title: Detective Chinatown 2 - EP 15
programme.desc: Tang Ren (Wang Baoqiang) lures Qin Feng (Liu Haoran) to New York for the World Detective Contest with prize money. The contest involves finding the murderer of the grandson of chinatown's 'godfather'. The duo teams up again risking lives to solve the case!

programme.title: Detective Chinatown 2 - EP 16
programme.desc: Tang Ren (Wang Baoqiang) lures Qin Feng (Liu Haoran) to New York for the World Detective Contest with prize money. The contest involves finding the murderer of the grandson of chinatown's 'godfather'. The duo teams up again risking lives to solve the case!

programme.title: Everlasting Longing - EP 22
programme.desc: [With English and Chinese subtitles] The story follows Jun Qiluo (Angelababy), the eldest daughter of the ruling Jun family, who unexpectedly meets Xuan Lie (Song Weilong), the leader of the Xuan tribe, and go through hardships and life-and-death experiences.

programme.title: The Spectator - EP 20
programme.desc: With a serial murder case as the background, the story tells the story of coffee shop owner Wang Mixi (Pakho Chau) who refuses to be a bystander and chooses to punish the bad guys in his own way to seek justice. However, the killer and policewoman Yao Ziru (Venus Wong) develop feelings for each other.

programme.title: Lo And Behold - EP 2008
programme.desc: This story revolves around the Hung family, their working lives and friends, as well as the ghost that the family befriends!

programme.title: Let Me Take Your Pulse - EP 21
programme.desc: A doctoral student of Traditional Chinese Medicine starts his career at a governmental clinic. The director of the clinic is an ex-girlfriend who has different values. The two eventually work and grow together.

programme.title: Let Me Take Your Pulse - EP 22
programme.desc: A doctoral student of Traditional Chinese Medicine starts his career at a governmental clinic. The director of the clinic is an ex-girlfriend who has different values. The two eventually work and grow together.

programme.title: Young Charioteers
programme.desc: At high school, YAU TAT (Him Law) and YIP FAI-TING (Sammy Sum) became good friends during a cycling race, but FAI-TING returned to Taiwan due to a family emergency. The two have lost contact with each other until one day they reunite at an accounting firm. TAT's supervisor LING HEI (Lin Xiawei) often manipulates office politics and sows discord amongst colleagues, making TAT and FAI-TING bear a grudge against each other.

programme.title: To Grow With Love
programme.desc: Filipino-born Chinese HO MEI-TIN (WU, MYOLIE) has been slightly overweight since childhood. She is constantly teased about her chubby frame while in Hong Kong, where it is widely recognized that thinness is the essence of beauty. Feeling so frustrated and annoyed, TIN decides to move back to the Philippines. However, when she notices the comments left in her drawing in response to her views on love, she soon has a change of heart and chooses to stay and look for the man of her dreams.

programme.title: Airport Strikers
programme.desc: Fresh-faced police officers Cheung King-san (Owen Cheung), San Hoi-ching (Sisley Choy), Ho Si-wa (Gloria Tang) and Wu Kwun-chung (Brian Chu) apply to join Airport Security Unit (ASU) due to different reasons. The quartet manage to survive drillmaster Man Wing-keung’s (Eddie Kwan) boot camp and become ASU officers after graduation. King-san and ASU CIP Cheung Chun-hak (Hugo Wong) just keep antagonizing each other.

programme.title: Airport Strikers
programme.desc: Fresh-faced police officers Cheung King-san (Owen Cheung), San Hoi-ching (Sisley Choy), Ho Si-wa (Gloria Tang) and Wu Kwun-chung (Brian Chu) apply to join Airport Security Unit (ASU) due to different reasons. The quartet manage to survive drillmaster Man Wing-keung’s (Eddie Kwan) boot camp and become ASU officers after graduation. King-san and ASU CIP Cheung Chun-hak (Hugo Wong) just keep antagonizing each other.

programme.title: Life Begins At Forty
programme.desc: WING (FONG, ALEX), GAY (CHIN KA LOK) and FAI (TSEUNG CHI KWONG, RAM) are flatmates. They are facing their mid-life crises at the same time._x000D_ _x000D_WING used to be a renowned creative person in the advertising field. However his young boss, KI (SHEH CHARMAINE), now earns more credits than he does. KI is a perfectionist at work. She picks on WING constantly. However, when they are alone together, she is very fragile. She confuses WING completely.
